Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to the report of a minor fire on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Cermak-Chinatown due to the report of a minor fire on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
